latex:
Let \[F=\log\dfrac{1+x}{1-x}.\] Find a new function $G$ by replacing each $x$ in $F$ by \[\dfrac{3x+x^3}{1+3x^2},\] and simplify. The simplified expression $G$ is equal to:\\
\\
$\textbf{(A)}\ -F \qquad
\textbf{(B)}\ F\qquad
\textbf{(C)}\ 3F \qquad
\textbf{(D)}\ F^3 \qquad
\textbf{(E)}\ F^3-F$
